00085 class ExecutableDirectoryIsSet : public IThen
00086 {
00087 public:
00088     void ensure_that(const World& world)
00089     {
00090         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_EQUAL(world.GetGiven<ExecutableDirectory>()->get_directory_name(), world.GetWhen<TranslationLoaderIsCreated>()->get_loader()->get_executable_directory());
00091     }
00092 };

00094 class TranslationCanBeCreatedFromDisk : public IThen
00095 {
00096 public:
00097     void ensure_that(const World& world)
00098     {
00099 #ifdef LINUX
00100         std::string translation_file("share/BibleStudy/Translations/TT.buf");
00101 #else
00102         std::string translation_file("Translations/TT.buf");
00103 #endif
00104         boost::shared_ptr<const Translation> translation = world.GetWhen<TranslationLoaderIsCreated>()->get_loader()->create_translation(translation_file);
00105         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(translation != NULL);
00106     }
00107 };

00109 class TranslationCannotBeCreated : public IThen
00110 {

00118 #endif
00119         boost::shared_ptr<const Translation> translation = world.GetWhen<TranslationLoaderIsCreatedWithNonExistentExecutableDirectory>()->get_loader()->create_translation(translation_file);
00120         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(translation == NULL);

00139 class TranslationLoaderBehavior : public CppUnit::TestFixture
00140 {
00141     CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE(TranslationLoaderBehavior);
00142     CPPUNIT_TEST(shouldStoreExecutableDirectoryOnCreation);
00143     CPPUNIT_TEST(shouldCreateTranslationFromDiskWhenRequested);
00144     CPPUNIT_TEST(shouldNotCreateTranslationIfExecutableDirectoryDoesNotExist);
00145     CPPUNIT_TEST(shouldNotCreateTranslationIfTranslationFileDoesNotExist);
00146     CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE_END();
00147 
00148 public:
00149     void setUp()
00150     {
00151     }
00152 
00153     void tearDown()
00154     {
00155     }
00156 
00157     void shouldStoreExecutableDirectoryOnCreation()
00158     {
00159         World world;
00160 
00161         world.Given<ExecutableDirectory>();
00162         world.When<TranslationLoaderIsCreated>();
00163         world.Then<ExecutableDirectoryIsSet>();
00164     }
00165 
00166     void shouldCreateTranslationFromDiskWhenRequested()
00167     {
00168         World world;
00169 
00170         world.Given<ExecutableDirectory>();
00171         world.When<TranslationLoaderIsCreated>();
00172         world.Then<TranslationCanBeCreatedFromDisk>();
00173     }
00174 
00175     void shouldNotCreateTranslationIfExecutableDirectoryDoesNotExist()
00176     {
00177         World world;
00178 
00179         world.Given<NonExistentExecutableDirectory>();
00180         world.When<TranslationLoaderIsCreatedWithNonExistentExecutableDirectory>();
00181         world.Then<TranslationCannotBeCreated>();
00182     }
00183 
00184     void shouldNotCreateTranslationIfTranslationFileDoesNotExist()
00185     {
00186         World world;
00187 
00188         world.Given<ExecutableDirectory>();
00189         world.When<TranslationLoaderIsCreated>();
00190         world.Then<TranslationCannotBeCreatedWithNonExistentTranslationFile>();
00191     }
00192 };
